de.mrapp.android.adapter

Class SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.util.view.AbstractViewHolderAdapter
      • de.mrapp.android.adapter.decorator.AbstractDecorator
        • de.mrapp.android.adapter.decorator.AbstractExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType>
          • de.mrapp.android.adapter.SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType>
  • Type Parameters:
    GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's group items
    ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's child items

    public abstract class SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType>
extends AbstractExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType>
    An abstract base class for all decorators, which should allow to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of an SelectableExpandableListAdapter.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      SelectableExpandableListDecorator()

    • Constructor Detail

      • SelectableExpandableListDecorator

        public SelectableExpandableListDecorator()

    • Method Detail

      • applyDecoratorOnGroup

        public final void applyDecoratorOnGroup(@NonNull
                                        android.content.Context context,
                                        @NonNull
                                        SelectableExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                                        @NonNull
                                        android.view.View view,
                                        @NonNull
                                        GroupType group,
                                        int index,
                                        boolean expanded,
                                        boolean enabled,
                                        int state,
                                        boolean filtered,
                                        boolean selected)
        The method, which is invoked by an adapter to apply the decorator on a group item. It initializes the view holder pattern, which is provided by the decorator and then delegates the method call to the decorator's custom implementation of the method onShowGroup(...):void.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        adapter - The adapter, whose items are visualized by the decorator, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        view - The view, which is used to visualize the group item, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        group - The group item, which should be visualized, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group item may not be null
        index - The index of the group item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        expanded - True, if the group item, which should be visualized, is currently expanded, false otherwise
        enabled - True, if the group item, which should be visualized, is currently enabled, false otherwise
        state - The current state of the group item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        filtered - True, if at least one filter is currently applied on the adapter's group items, false otherwise
        selected - True, if the group item, which should be visualized, is currently selected, false otherwise

      • applyDecoratorOnChild

        public final void applyDecoratorOnChild(@NonNull
                                        android.content.Context context,
                                        @NonNull
                                        SelectableExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                                        @NonNull
                                        android.view.View view,
                                        @NonNull
                                        ChildType child,
                                        int childIndex,
                                        @NonNull
                                        GroupType group,
                                        int groupIndex,
                                        boolean enabled,
                                        int state,
                                        boolean filtered,
                                        boolean selected)
        The method, which is invoked by an adapter to apply the decorator on a child item. It initializes the view holder pattern, which is provided by the decorator and then delegates the method call to the decorator's custom implementation of the method onShowChild(...):void.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        adapter - The adapter, whose items are visualized by the decorator, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        view - The view, which is used to visualize the child item, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        child - The child item, which should be visualized, as an instance of the generic type ChildType. The child item may not be null
        childIndex - The index of the child item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        group - The group item, the child, which should be visualized, belongs to, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group item may not be null
        groupIndex - The index of the group item, the child, which should be visualized, belongs to, as an Integer value
        enabled - True, if the child item, which should be visualized, is currently enabled, false otherwise
        state - The current state of the child item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        filtered - True, if at least one filter is currently applied on the adapter's child items, false otherwise
        selected - True, if the child item, which should be visualized, is currently selected, false otherwise

      • onShowGroup

        public abstract void onShowGroup(@NonNull
                                 android.content.Context context,
                                 @NonNull
                                 SelectableExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                                 @NonNull
                                 android.view.View view,
                                 @NonNull
                                 GroupType group,
                                 int viewType,
                                 int index,
                                 boolean expanded,
                                 boolean enabled,
                                 int state,
                                 boolean filtered,
                                 boolean selected)
        The method which is invoked, when the view, which is used to visualize a group item, should be shown, respectively when it should be refreshed. The purpose of this method is to customize the appearance of the view, which is used to visualize the appropriate group item, depending on its state and whether it is currently enabled or not.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        adapter - The adapter, whose items are visualized by the decorator, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        view - The view, which is used to visualize the group item, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        group - The group item, which should be visualized, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group item may not be null
        viewType - The view type of the group item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        index - The index of the group item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        expanded - True, if the group item, which should be visualized, is currently expanded, false otherwise
        enabled - True, if the group item, which should be visualized, is currently enabled, false otherwise
        state - The current state of the group item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        filtered - True, if at least one filter is currently applied on the adapter's group items, false otherwise
        selected - True, if the group item, which should be visualized, is currently selected, false otherwise

      • onShowChild

        public abstract void onShowChild(@NonNull
                                 android.content.Context context,
                                 @NonNull
                                 SelectableExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                                 @NonNull
                                 android.view.View view,
                                 @NonNull
                                 ChildType child,
                                 int viewType,
                                 int childIndex,
                                 @NonNull
                                 GroupType group,
                                 int groupIndex,
                                 boolean enabled,
                                 int state,
                                 boolean filtered,
                                 boolean selected)
        The method which is invoked, when the view, which is used to visualize a child item, should be shown, respectively when it should be refreshed. The purpose of this method is to customize the appearance of the view, which is used to visualize the appropriate child item, depending on its state and whether it is currently enabled or not.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        adapter - The adapter, whose items are visualized by the decorator, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        view - The view, which is used to visualize the child item, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        child - The child item, which should be visualized, as an instance of the generic type ChildType. The child item may not be null
        viewType - The view type of the child item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        childIndex - The index of the child item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        group - The group item, the child, which should be visualized, belongs to, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group item may not be null
        groupIndex - The index of the group item, the child, which should be visualized, belongs to, as an Integer value
        enabled - True, if the child item, which should be visualized, is currently enabled, false otherwise
        state - The current state of the child item, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        filtered - True, if at least one filter is currently applied on the adapter's child items, false otherwise
        selected - True, if the child item, which should be visualized, is currently selected, false otherwise
